oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic: to combat pesticide residues
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Das, Kasturi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: India
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article makes a strategic case for a shift to organic agriculture in India in the context of the controversy on pesticicide residues found in soft drinks in the country.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Das, Kasturi (2004) Organic: to combat pesticide residues. www.indiatogether.org, March 2004.
